page.title: Our Products
page.subtitle: Cutting-edge hardware solutions for complete vehicle monitoring
page.metaTitle: Vehicle Hardware Products | AI Dashcams, MDVR, GPS Trackers
page.metaDesc: Explore our range of professional vehicle hardware including GPS trackers, 4G dashcams, MDVR systems, and smart displays.

items.title: C08L Asset Tracker
items.description: C08L 4G Asset Tracker with ultra-long battery life, ideal for trailer and container tracking.

items.title: C08W 4G GPS Tracker
items.description: High-precision C08W 4G GPS tracking device offering real-time location monitoring and advanced fleet analytics.

items.title: D401 AI Camera
items.description: D401 AI Camera with advanced ADAS and DMS capabilities for proactive fleet safety.

items.title: D501 4G DashCam
items.description: Compact D501 4G Dashcam offering dual-lens recording (road + cabin) and cloud connectivity.

items.title: D604 AI CarBox
items.description: Powerful D604 AI CarBox MDVR for centralized fleet video surveillance and intelligent data processing.

items.title: D701 Pro 4G DashCam
items.description: Rugged D701 4G Dashcam designed for logistics and heavy transport, featuring tamper-proof data security.

items.title: D901 AI Smart Camera
items.description: Top-tier D901 AI Camera for commercial fleets, featuring multi-channel recording and advanced AI analytics.

items.title: OEM & ODM Custom Solution
items.description: Tailored hardware design and manufacturing services. We build custom GPS trackers, dashcams, and MDVRs to your specifications.
